basics.name: Daan Schouten
basics.label: PhD Candidate in Medical AI
basics.summary: Daan is a fourth-year PhD candidate at the Computational Pathology Group. His research mainly revolves around multimodal AI in medicine, with a focus on MRI and digital pathology in both prostate cancer and breast cancer.
